reviewContent: Xavier has been great to work with.
While Xavier is rather new, he makes up for it with professionalism and persistence.
Charlie is an excellent pilot and is always very professional.
Charlie always knows exactly whats supposed to happen, his extensive experience makes him reliable.
This guy crashed our drone, and then got upset at us for yelling. Wouldn't recommend him.
Jeb is a menace. He flies like he's in a drone race. While he IS fast, I don't think he's very safe.
Isaac is a little older, but that makes him really patient and he's got alot of experience.
Isaac great. He's took a little longer than other pilots, but he still gets the job done.
Liam provided excellent aerial shots and was very professional throughout the project.
Great experience with Liam. His attention to detail was impressive.
Emma's expertise in drone mapping made our project a success. Highly recommended!
Emma was thorough and professional, though the project took a bit longer than expected.
Noah's drone work was exceptional, but communication could be improved.
Very skilled pilot with great results, though we had some scheduling issues.
Olivia was fantastic and provided high-quality footage for our promotional video.
Olivia's drone work was excellent, but the project was slightly delayed.
James's drone racing skills are impressive, though not ideal for our project needs.
James was fast but sometimes too reckless. Not the best fit for delicate tasks.
Sophia was a great addition to our project with her expertise in agriculture.
Sophia did an excellent job, though the turnaround time was a bit longer than expected.
Benjamin's drone maintenance skills are top-notch. Highly reliable.
Benjamin was good with repairs but had some trouble with the initial setup.
Ava did a fantastic job with real estate photography. The results were stunning.
Ava was very professional and the photos were top quality.
Mason's work in emergency response was impressive. Highly skilled and reliable.
Mason was excellent under pressure, though there were a few minor communication issues.
Isabella's aerial cinematography was perfect for our film project. Highly recommended.
Isabella was great with the camera work, though the project was slightly behind schedule.
Ethan did an excellent job with drone inspections. Very thorough and professional.
Ethan's work was very detailed, though there were some delays in receiving the final report.
Mia's event coverage was impressive and she managed live streaming flawlessly.
Mia did a fantastic job, but the video editing took longer than expected.
Alexander's high-altitude flights were exactly what we needed. Great results.
Alexander's work was very good, though the weather caused some delays.
Charlotte provided excellent drone footage for our wildlife project. Very detailed work.
Charlotte's work was top-notch, although there were minor issues with equipment.
William's search and rescue operations were outstanding. Very skilled and dependable.
William did a great job with the rescue mission, but there were some delays in the initial response.
